DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter Achilles tendon study Switzerland . Comparing three mainstream treatment type : open , percutaneous conservative ( non-operative ) treatment . Comparing force torque measurement , muscle volume clinical score .
DOC.brief_title: Calf Muscle Atrophy After Achilles Tendon Rupture . A Clinical-Radiological-Biomechanical Multicenter Study .
DOC.criteria: 2065 year age , healthy , contralateral leg physiological , clinically determine alignment knee , foot ankle trauma healthy leg neuromuscular impairment include muscle dystrophy posttraumatic injury osteoarthritis knee , foot ankle affect leg . rerupture reoperation Achilles tendon surgical site infection neuromuscular disease include muscle dystrophy ankle valgus 15° ankle varus 5° know pathology nonaffected leg general MRI exclusion criterion ( e.g . pacemaker , metal qualify MRI , tattoo claustrophobia ) body mass index ( BMI ) > 40 kg/m2
DOC.keyword: Achilles tendon , muscle volume , Achilles tendon length , force , ATRS , Hannover , AOFAS
